div.p: ZendCon & OpenEnterprise, happening October 15 - 17th, 2018 in Las Vegas is the premier technology conference designed to teach and share practical experiences from the front lines of enterprise PHP and open source environments. Focused on solving real-world, enterprise-class problems, technical business leaders, strategists, and developers will assemble to discuss case studies and best practices around the application of PHP and open source to transform business.
